src:
Manchester United v Premier League opäť zaváhal a prehral na ihrisku Bournemouthu
02 Nov 2019, 21:35 by Webnoviny
2.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – Futbalisti Manchestru United v anglickej Premier League opäť zakopli, v sobotňajšom súboji 11. kola prehrali na pôde Bournemouthu 0:1. Jediný gól duelu strelil tesne pred prestávkou nórsky útočník domáceho kolektívu Joshua King. Zásah tohto Nóra dostal pod ešte väčší tlak jeho krajana – trénera na lavičke United Oleho Gunnara Solskjaera.
Jeho zverenci sú v aktuálnej tabuľke súťaže až na 10. miesto, na vedúci FC Liverpool strácajú už 18 bodov. „V druhom polčase sme nepremenili naše šance na vyrovnanie a tak nemáme ani bod,“ zhodnotil Solskjaer.
„Pokúšali sme sa až do úplného konca, no chýba nám kvalita, čo znamená ďalšiu stratu bodov,“ pokračoval nórsky kouč, v minulosti hráčska legenda United. Solskjaer po prehre u súpera priznal sklamanie. „Takéto súboje musíme vyhrávať, ak chceme držať krok so špicou tabuľky,“ dodal.
Manchester United sa pohybuje v strede tabuľky aj preto, že po 14. septembri zvíťazil v Premier League iba raz, pred týždňom v Norwichi, Z ostatných šiestich ligových zápasov majú „Red Devils“ bilanciu jeden triumf, dve remízy a tri prehry.
Premier League 2019/2020
11. kolo – sobota
Bournemouth – Manchester United 1:0 (1:0)Gól: 45. J. King
Arsenal Londýn – Wolwerhampton 1:1 (1:0)Góly: 21. Aubameyang – 76. Jimenéz
Aston Villa – FC Liverpool 1:2 (1:0)Góly: 21. Trezegeut – 87. Robertson, 90.+. S. Mané
Brighton – Norwich 2:0 (0:0)Góly: 68. Tossard, 84. Duffy
Manchester City – Southampton 2:1 (0:1)Góly: 70. S. Agüero, 86. Walker – 13. Ward-Prowse
Sheffield United – Burnley 3:0 (3:0)Góly: 17. a 43. Lundstram, 44. Fleck
West Ham – Newcastle 2:3 (0:2)Góly: 73. Balbuena, 90. Sondgrass – 16. Clark, 22. Fernandez, 51. ShelveyMartin Dúbravka odchytal za hostí celý duel
Watford – FC Chelsea 1:2 (0:1)Góly: 79. Deulofeu (z pok. kopu) – 5. Abraham, 55. Pulisic

text:
Manchester United in the Premier League hesitated again and lost on the Bournemouth pitch
02 Nov 2019, 21:35 by Webnoviny
2.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) - Manchester United footballers in the English Premier League tripped again, in Saturday's 11th round match lost on Bournemouth 0: 1. The only goal of the duel was scored just before the break by Norwegian home team striker Joshua King. The intervention of this Norra came under even greater pressure from his countryman - coach on the United bench Ole Gunnar Solskjaer.
His team is up to 10th in the current chart, losing 18 points to FC Liverpool. "In the second half we did not change our chances of equalization and so we have no point," Solskjaer said.
"We tried to the very end, but we lack quality, which means a further loss of points," continued the Norwegian coach, formerly legendary United. Solskjaer admitted a disappointment after a loss at the opponent. "We have to win such fights if we want to keep up with the top of the table," he added.
Manchester United is also at the center of the table because after September 14, he won the Premier League only once, a week ago in Norwich.
Premier League 2019/2020
11th round - Saturday
Bournemouth - Manchester United 1: 0 (1: 0) Goal: 45
Arsenal London - Wolwerhampton 1: 1 (1: 0) Goals: 21. Aubameyang - 76. Jimenez
Aston Villa - FC Liverpool 1: 2 (1: 0) Goals: 21. Trezegeut - 87. Robertson, 90. +. S. Mané
Brighton - Norwich 2: 0 (0: 0) Goals: 67. Tossard, 84. Duffy
Manchester City - Southampton 2: 1 (0: 1) Goals: 70th S. Agüero, 86. Walker - 13. Ward-Prowse
Sheffield United - Burnley 3: 0 (3: 0) Goals: 17th and 43th Lundstram, 44. Fleck
West Ham - Newcastle 2: 3 (0: 2) Goals: 73. Balbuena, 90. Sondgrass - 16. Clark, 22. Fernandez, 51. ShelveyMartin Dubravka caught the whole duel for the guests
Watford - FC Chelsea 1: 2 (0: 1) Goals: 79. Deulofeu (off pok.) - 5. Abraham, 55. Pulisic
